articles.title: Realme Narzo 10 to Go on Sale Today at 12 Noon via Flipkart, Realme Site: Price in India, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Realme Narzo 10 goes for sale yet again today (July 21) at 12pm (noon) via Flipkart and the brand’s website. While only a 4GB RAM + 128GB storage model will be available, customers can choose from three colour options.
